name: No Yolk Deviled Eggs
author: Steven D. H.
summary: Deviled eggs without the yolks, using potato instead of yolks.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon prepared yellow mustard, or to taste
directions: Place the eggs in a pan of cold water and bring to a boil
Once they boil, remove from the heat, cover and let stand for 10 minutes
Place the potato in a saucepan with enough water to cover
Bring to a boil, and cook until tender
Cut the eggs in half lengthwise, and remove the yolks; reserve for other uses or discard
Place the potatoes in a medium bowl
Mash with a whisk until smooth, then mix in the relish, sugar, mayonnaise and mustard
Spoon into the egg whites, and dust with paprika
